alert.note: Alert for Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 9:13PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rockingham, northern Caswell and south central Pittsylvania Counties and the City of Danville through 1000 PM EDT... At 913 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pelham, or near Mayfield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Bethel... Providence... Mayfield... Gatewood... Blanch... and Hamer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
